body: Railroads in the Siege       It was the railroads that put Petersburg on the map and made it critical to Richmond's survival. It was also the reason that brought it's demise. Control of the rail lines listed below were what many soldiers gave their lives for and determined the outcome of the siege.  (Railroads not in bold: web pages under construction)   City Point Railroad  Richmond & Petersburg Railroad  South Side Railroad  United States Military Railroad  Weldon Railroad
title: Petersburg National Battlefield: Railroads in the Siege
